title: "Big Liddle’ Lies." (LIVE from Portland!)
description: House Democrats get moving on an impeachment strategy as a cascade of news reports sheds light on even more potentially impeachable behavior by President Trump and his goon squad. Student climate activist Ella Shriner joins Jon, Jon, Tommy, Dan and Shawna Thomas of Vice News on stage in Portland, Oregon.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
